name: DEMISE
description:
LIFE SYSTEMS: CRITICAL

LEAK DETECTED

DEATH IS IMMINENT

CHANCE OF SURVIVAL: 1%

  • A first-person shooter where you can see everything at once. 360 degrees of intense, retro vision. Shoot in front of you. Shoot behind you. Nothing escapes your sight.
  • Fight your way through hate-filled corridors as you struggle to survive in a desolate, man-bandoned spaceship.
  • Watch your enemies be flung into outer space and explode as you destroy corridors and unleash your moderately-repressed rage.

A game by Yan Knoop, Keano Raubun (@xArcky), and Mikkel Bøgeskov Svendsen (@IkarosAV), and Jack Beeby.

Songs by ParagonX9

  • ParagonX9 - Chaos Devotion
  • ParagonX9 - Chaos Survivor
